Some	women	find	out	that	
their baby has died only when 
they have a routine scan. 
If they have had no pain or 
bleeding, this can come as a 
terrible shock, especially if the 
scan shows that the baby died 
days or weeks before. This is 
sometimes called a missed or 
silent miscarriage.
